'''15w33b''' is the eighth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.9]], released on August 12, 2015,<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.mojang.com/2015/08/minecraft-snapshot-15w33a|archive=y|title=Minecraft snapshot 15w33b|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]|date=August 12, 2015}}</ref> to fix some bugs and crashes from [[15w33a]].

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''[[Pick block]]'''
* Now works on [[Survival]] for items that are in the player's [[inventory]], but not in their [[hotbar]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=15w33b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|40452|Missing "<code>pack.mcmeta</code>" on Mac OSX.
|47080|Spectators count as "players" for purposes of sleeping in SMP.
|48621|Regular Pick block after {{key|Ctrl}} and PB selects the block with data in it.
|50304|Experience orbs too low to the ground.
|51984|Picking blocks in Creative replaces enchanted tools in hand.
|74234|Inconsistent {{key|ctrl}} plus pick-block behavior.
|79710|Pick block moves items and removes their nbt.
|80863|Pick block not exchanging items on Survival.
|;dev
|85109|Brewing Stand Block Model size of a full block.
|;previous
|85285|Entities removed from world unless in minecarts.
|85837|Crash or chunk corruption on turning "text" into components.
|85839|Crashing when summoning a mob.
|85869|Command block previous output broken.
|85884|Lingering potion shows incorrect time values.
}}</onlyinclude>
